lvlpoc_leader_startconvo: ^Sorry about all that, been a while since we've had any visitors.
^Can I get you something to drink? Some tea? I think we've still got some from the last supply run... yep! 6 months past its use-by, that alright?

c-0: ^Please, don't be shy! You're our guest, of course you can have the best we have to offer!

tea: ^Now, do you take your tea with or without milk?

c-0: ^Ah, sorry about this, but we don't actually have any...
